DOC.brief_summary: Reduce the common complications incidence about patients placed tissue expansion devices to around 5%.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Tissue Expansion Devices Complications
DOC.detailed_description: Study designï¼š Randomized parallel controlled trial. Study comments: 1.Telephone follow-up trainment group about 2-3 months until secondary hospital. 2.Promote the health management manual of patient placed expander,which includes discharge list, injection list, expander affusion operation procedure, injection myth, you ask me answer,injection record, injection diary record, appointment diaries etc.
DOC.criteria: aged 170 years male and female; no complication when inclusion; sign the informed consent. joined other clinical trial; occurred complications before inclusion; other infectious diseases; the pregnant or lactating women.
